.class public auto ansi sealed InvalidateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

type InvalidateEventHandler = delegate of obj * InvalidateEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre cómo controlar eventos con delegados, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
